  <script>
   // Load CSS via Deferral
  var loadDeferredStyles = function() {
    var addStylesNode = document.getElementById("deferred-styles");
    var replacement = document.createElement("div");
    replacement.innerHTML = addStylesNode.textContent;
    document.querySelector('body').appendChild(replacement)
    addStylesNode.parentElement.removeChild(addStylesNode);
  };
  var raf = window.requestAnimationFrame || window.mozRequestAnimationFrame ||
      window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame || window.msRequestAnimationFrame;
  if (raf) raf(function() { window.setTimeout(loadDeferredStyles, 0); });
  else window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', loadDeferredStyles);
  
  function jsLoaded(){/*console.log("JS Loaded");*/}
  </script>

  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   !(function(o,n,t){t=o.createElement(n),o=o.getElementsByTagName(n)[0],t.async=1,t.src="https://profusesupport.com/v2/0/fiwBvTgc29EVE0skMlb3zpzZVVI_r2N9EWtugrJ9eiLo6qiTFlPiUPSIybVGBG50sDwdqewBnnKFw",o.parentNode.insertBefore(t,o)})(document,"script"),(function(o,n){o[n]=o[n]||function(){(o[n].q=o[n].q||[]).push(arguments)}})(window,"admiral");!(function(n,e,r,t){function o(){if((function o(t){try{return(t=localStorage.getItem("v4ac1eiZr0"))&&0<t.split(",")[4]}catch(n){}return!1})()){var t=n[e].pubads();typeof t.setTargeting===r&&t.setTargeting("admiral-engaged","true")}}(t=n[e]=n[e]||{}).cmd=t.cmd||[],typeof t.pubads===r?o():typeof t.cmd.unshift===r?t.cmd.unshift(o):t.cmd.push(o)})(window,"googletag","function");;;;;
  </script>
  <!--AdThrive Head Tag -->
  <script>
   (function(w, d) {
      w.adthrive = w.adthrive || {};
      w.adthrive.cmd = w.adthrive.cmd || [];
      w.adthrive.plugin = 'adthrive-ads-1.0.39';
      w.adthrive.host = 'ads.adthrive.com';
      w.adthrive.threshold = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100 + 1);
/*    var s = d.createElement('script');
      s.async = true;
      s.referrerpolicy = 'no-referrer-when-downgrade';
      s.src = 'https://' + w.adthrive.host + '/sites/5ac64c79fdf4d60603abe6a5/ads.min.js?referrer=' + w.encodeURIComponent(w.location.href) + '&threshold='+w.adthrive.threshold;
      var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); */
  })(window, document);

  function cam_unique_array(a) {
      var seen = {};
      return a.filter(function(item) {
          return seen.hasOwnProperty(item) ? false : (seen[item] = true);
      });
  }
  window.adthrive.cmd.push(function() {
      cam_targeting_values = [];
    cam_unique_targeting=[];
      var cam_abrams_loc = encodeURIComponent(window.location.pathname.split('/')[1]).toLowerCase();
      if (cam_abrams_loc.length == 0) {
          cam_targeting_values.push('abrams_home');
      } else if (cam_abrams_loc.length <= 35) {
          cam_targeting_values.push('abrams_' + cam_abrams_loc);
      } else {
          cam_targeting_values.push('abrams_' + cam_abrams_loc.substring(0, 33));
      }

      if (cam_targeting_values.length > 0) {
      cam_unique_targeting=cam_unique_array(cam_targeting_values);
          window.adthrive.siteAds.targeting.push({
              key: 'at_custom_1',
              value: cam_unique_targeting,
          });
      }
      setTimeout(function() {
          window.adthrive.advertiser_ids = [];
          window.adthrive.slots._slots.forEach((values, key) => {
              if (values.googleTagSlot.getResponseInformation()) {
                  if (values.googleTagSlot.getResponseInformation().advertiserId == 4811960334) {
                      console.log('CAM - disabling refresh on : ' + key);
                      window.adthrive.slotManager.updateRefreshTimeout(key, 0);
                  }
              }
          });
      }, 10000);
  });
  </script>
  <!-- comScore -->
  <script id="comscore" type="text/javascript">
   var _comscore = _comscore || [];
  _comscore.push({c1: '2', c2: '9304643'});
  (function() {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), el = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.async = true;
    s.src = (document.location.protocol == 'https:' ? 'https://sb' : 'http://b') + '.scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js';
    el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
  })();
  </script>
  <noscript>
   <img alt="comScore" src="https://b.scorecardresearch.com/p?c1=2&amp;c2=9304643&amp;cv=2.0&amp;cj=1" style="visibility:hidden;"/>
  </noscript>
  <!-- Chartbeat -->
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var _sf_startpt = (new Date()).getTime();
  </script>
  <!-- start chartbeat -->
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var _sf_async_config={};
			/** CONFIGURATION START **/
			_sf_async_config.uid = 3557;
			_sf_async_config.domain = "mediaite.com";
						/** CONFIGURATION END **/
			(function(){
				function loadChartbeat() {
					window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime();
					var e = document.createElement("script");
					e.setAttribute("language", "javascript");
					e.setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
					e.setAttribute("src","https://static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js");
					document.body.appendChild(e);
				}
				var oldonload = window.onload;
				window.onload = (typeof window.onload != "function") ?
				loadChartbeat : function() { oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); };
			})();
  </script>
  <!-- end chartbeat -->
  <script id="ga" type="text/javascript">
   var _gaq = [['_setAccount', 'UA-9069088-1'], ['_trackPageview']];
  (function() {
    var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
    ga.src = (document.location.protocol == 'https:' ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'stats.g.doubleclick.net/dc.js';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
  })();
  function recordOutboundLink(link, category, action) {
    _gat._getTrackerByName()._trackEvent(category, action);
    setTimeout('document.location = "' + link.href + '"', 100);
  }
  </script>
  <!-- Facebook -->
  <!-- <div id="fb-root"></div> -->
  <script>
   (function(d, s, id) {
    var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
    if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
    js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
    js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#xfbml=1";
    fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
  }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
  </script>
  <!-- End Facebook -->

  <script>
   window.OneSignal = window.OneSignal || [];

      OneSignal.push( function() {
        OneSignal.SERVICE_WORKER_UPDATER_PATH = "OneSignalSDKUpdaterWorker.js.php";
        OneSignal.SERVICE_WORKER_PATH = "OneSignalSDKWorker.js.php";
        OneSignal.SERVICE_WORKER_PARAM = { scope: '/' };

        OneSignal.setDefaultNotificationUrl("https://www.mediaite.com");
        var oneSignal_options = {};
        window._oneSignalInitOptions = oneSignal_options;

        oneSignal_options['wordpress'] = true;
oneSignal_options['appId'] = '135a8c0a-92bf-468c-8032-395b9c19fe97';

oneSignal_options['safari_web_id'] = "web.onesignal.auto.0353ec9c-a08c-4477-8a0d-c11d5b7e8e59";

oneSignal_options['promptOptions'] = { };
oneSignal_options['promptOptions']['siteName'] = "https://www.mediaite.com";
                OneSignal.init(window._oneSignalInitOptions);
                OneSignal.showSlidedownPrompt();      });

      function documentInitOneSignal() {
        var oneSignal_elements = document.getElementsByClassName("OneSignal-prompt");

        var oneSignalLinkClickHandler = function(event) { OneSignal.push(['registerForPushNotifications']); event.preventDefault(); };        for(var i = 0; i < oneSignal_elements.length; i++)
          oneSignal_elements[i].addEventListener('click', oneSignalLinkClickHandler, false);
      }

      if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
           documentInitOneSignal();
      }
      else {
           window.addEventListener("load", function(event){
               documentInitOneSignal();
          });
      }
  </script>

         <polygon points="40.51 0.04 38.47 3.6 37.41 0.04 32.99 0.04 31.71 10.52 35.2 10.52 35.85 5.2 37.62 10.5 40.64 5.42 40.01 10.52 43.5 10.52 44.78 0.04 40.51 0.04" style="fill:#030f21">
         </polygon>
         <path d="M61.6,1.22H57L55.69,11.69h4.62a6.12,6.12,0,0,0,5.9-5.25A4.53,4.53,0,0,0,61.6,1.22m1.32,5.24c-.17,1.46-1.05,2.65-3.63,2.65.06-.53.44-3.59.65-5.3,2.58,0,3.17,1.18,3,2.65" style="fill:#030f21" transform="translate(0 -1.15)">
         </path>
         <line style="fill:#ce242b" x1="90.15" x2="89.45" y1="2.49" y2="8.16">
         </line>
         <line style="fill:#ce242b" x1="91.62" x2="92.14" y1="8.16" y2="3.89">
         </line>
         <line style="fill:#ce242b" x1="95.88" x2="96.23" y1="6.76" y2="3.89">
         </line>
         <polygon points="89.45 8.16 87.56 8.16 88.26 2.49 90.15 2.49 89.45 8.16" style="fill:#fff">
         </polygon>
         <polygon points="92.14 3.89 90.95 3.89 91.13 2.49 95.46 2.49 95.28 3.89 94.04 3.89 93.51 8.16 91.62 8.16 92.14 3.89" style="fill:#fff">
         </polygon>
         <polygon points="96.23 3.89 96.4 2.49 100.73 2.49 100.56 3.89 98.12 3.89 98.03 4.61 99.73 4.61 99.56 6.01 97.86 6.01 97.77 6.76 100.21 6.76 100.04 8.16 97.6 8.16 95.71 8.16 95.88 6.76 96.23 3.89" style="fill:#fff">
         </polygon>
         <path d="M109.48,10.5h-1.93V7.28h-2.81V5.53h2.81V2.44h1.93V5.53h2.81V7.28h-2.81Z" style="fill:#ce242b" transform="translate(0 -1.15)">
         </path>
        </svg>
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

     <section class="c-lead-post o-card-list" id="lead-post">
      <div class="o-card u-flex-col-rev">
       <a class="c-lead-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.mediaite.com/tv/trump-spox-claims-ex-president-having-a-lot-of-high-powered-meetings-on-launching-new-social-media-platform/">
        <img class="c-lead-post__img" src="https://am14.mediaite.com/med/cnt/uploads/2021/03/jason-miller-632x342.jpg"/>
       </a>
       <div class="o-card__info-cell">
        <h3 class="c-lead-post__headline">
         <a class="c-lead-post__headline-link" href="https://www.mediaite.com/tv/trump-spox-claims-ex-president-having-a-lot-of-high-powered-meetings-on-launching-new-social-media-platform/">
          Trump Spox Claims Ex-President Having ‘A Lot of High-Powered Meetings’ on Launching New Social Media Platform
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="o-dateline c-lead-post-dateline">
         <span class="o-dateline__author">
          <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
           By
          </span>
          Josh Feldman
         </span>
         <span class="o-dateline__date">
          Mar 21st
         </span>
        </div>

        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

   <section class="o-fcc-full@desktop o-slice c-promo-slice">
    <div class="o-slice-inner c-promo-slice-inner">
     <a class="c-promo-slice__link c-promo-slice__default-link is-shown-for-subs" href="https://mediaite.us9.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=80d42b1145bf804fa20df628b&amp;id=643c243cd6">
      <span class="c-promo-slice__newsletter-message">
       Need more media and politics? Sign up for the
       <span class="c-promo-slice__newsletter-logo">
        <svg class="c-logo__svg" viewbox="0 0 664.37 100">
         <style>
          .mediaite-shadow {fill: rgba(0,0,0,.25);}
    .mediaite-ite {fill: white;}
    .mediaite-bubble {fill: #c1262c;}
    .mediaite-text {fill: white;}
         </style>
         <g class="mediaite-bubble">
          <path d="M580.87,1.22c-46.12,0-83.5,21.84-83.5,48.78,0,11.5,6.83,22.07,18.23,30.41l-7.83,18.37,31.12-6.62a131.21,131.21,0,0,0,42,6.62c46.12,0,83.5-21.84,83.5-48.78S627,1.22,580.87,1.22M536.08,75H518.45l6.49-52.89h17.63Zm54.33-39.84H578.77L573.88,75H556.26l4.89-39.84H550l1.6-13H592Zm49.18,0H616.85l-.82,6.7h15.86l-1.6,13H614.43l-.87,7H636.3l-1.6,13H594.33l1.6-13,3.29-26.79,1.6-13h40.37Z" transform="translate(0 -0.9)">
          </path>
         </g>
         <g class="mediaite-text">
          <polygon points="330.01 97.86 341.98 0.33 374.5 0.33 362.52 97.86 330.01 97.86">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="214.49 24.38 217.44 0.33 142.99 0.33 140.03 24.38 133.97 73.8 131.01 97.86 163.53 97.86 205.47 97.86 208.42 73.8 166.48 73.8 168.08 60.8 197.34 60.8 200.29 36.74 171.03 36.74 172.55 24.38 214.49 24.38">
          </polygon>
          <path d="M457.34,98.76h32.51L466.33,1.22H424.77L377.3,98.76h32.51l8.07-16.58h35.46ZM427.85,61.7l13.74-28.23L448.4,61.7Z" transform="translate(0 -0.9)">
          </path>
          <polygon points="111.55 0 111.65 0 82.06 0 63.03 33.16 53.12 0 22.56 0 22.62 0 11.98 0 0 97.7 32.51 97.7 38.61 48.06 55.13 97.54 83.22 50.11 77.38 97.7 109.89 97.7 121.87 0 111.55 0">
          </polygon>
          <path d="M278.61,1.22H235.5l-12,97.54H256c3.63,0,7.32,0,10.56,0,27,0,51.62-21.91,54.94-48.93S305.64,1.22,278.61,1.22M291,50C289.27,63.64,281.09,74.7,257,74.7c.6-4.88,4.11-33.49,6.07-49.42,24.05,0,29.52,11.07,27.84,24.71" transform="translate(0 -0.9)">
          </path>
         </g>
         <g class="mediaite-shadow">
          <polygon points="518.45 74.06 518.45 74.06 518.45 74.06 518.45 74.06">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="613.56 61.01 617.68 61.01 618.11 57.49 633.81 57.49 635.41 44.44 632.01 41.04 631.88 41.04 630.29 53.96 614.43 53.96 613.56 61.01">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="542.57 21.18 542.57 21.18 542.57 21.18 542.57 21.18">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="618.45 21.18 618.45 21.18 618.45 21.18 618.45 21.18">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="641.36 21.35 641.17 21.37 639.59 34.22 616.85 34.22 616.03 40.92 620.15 40.92 620.54 37.74 643.11 37.74 644.71 24.7 641.36 21.35">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="536.08 74.06 518.45 74.06 522.12 77.73 539.75 77.73 546.24 24.85 542.57 21.18 536.08 74.06">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="592.03 21.18 592.01 21.18 590.41 34.22 578.77 34.22 573.88 74.06 556.26 74.06 556.37 73.14 556.23 74.06 559.9 77.73 577.52 77.73 582.42 37.89 594.08 37.89 595.68 24.85 592.03 21.18">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="634.7 74.06 611.96 74.06 594.33 74.06 594.33 74.05 594.33 74.06 598 77.73 615.63 77.73 615.65 77.58 638.22 77.58 639.75 64.46 636.3 61.01 634.7 74.06">
          </polygon>
          <polygon points="561.15 34.22 550.05 34.22 553.72 37.89 560.7 37.89 561.15 34.22">
          </polygon>
         </g>
         <g class="mediaite-ite">
          <path d="M536.08,75H518.45l6.49-52.89h17.63Zm54.33-39.84H578.77L573.88,75H556.26l4.89-39.84H550l1.6-13H592Zm49.18,0H616.85l-.82,6.7h15.86l-1.6,13H614.43l-.87,7H636.3l-1.6,13H594.33l1.6-13,3.29-26.79,1.6-13h40.37Z" transform="translate(0 -0.9)">
          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </span>
       <span class="c-promo-slice__newsletter-name">
        Live From The Green Room Newsletter
       </span>
      </span>
     </a>
    </div>
   </section>
   <section class="o-fcc-2x@desktop c-home-chron-posts o-chron-posts o-card-container u-lazy-parent" id="chron-posts">
    <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald o-herald-right@desktop c-home-chron-posts-heading" id="chron-heading">
     <div class="o-section-label">
      Happening Now
     </div>
    </div>

       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.mediaite.com/tv/why-were-you-not-prepared-for-this-abcs-raddatz-grills-dhs-sec-on-biden-admins-response-to-border-crisis/">
         'Why Were You Not Prepared for This?' ABC's Raddatz Grills DHS Sec on Biden Admin's Response to Border Crisis
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-dateline c-home-chron-post-dateline">
        <span class="o-dateline__author">

         </span>

        <span class="o-dateline__date">
         Mar 21st
        </span>
       </div>
       <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="5231893 https://www.mediaite.com/?p=5231893" href="https://www.mediaite.com/tv/why-were-you-not-prepared-for-this-abcs-raddatz-grills-dhs-sec-on-biden-admins-response-to-border-crisis/#disqus_thread">
       </a>
      </div>
     </li>
     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col-rev">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.mediaite.com/tv/chuck-todd-says-border-surge-is-a-political-crisis-for-biden/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am14.mediaite.com/med/cnt/uploads/2021/03/chuck-todd-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.mediaite.com/tv/chuck-todd-says-border-surge-is-a-political-crisis-for-biden/">
         Chuck Todd Says Border Surge Is a 'Political Crisis' for Biden
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-dateline c-home-chron-post-dateline">
        <span class="o-dateline__author">
         <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
          By
         </span>
         Josh Feldman
        </span>
        <span class="o-dateline__date">
         Mar 21st
        </span>
       </div>
       <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="5231888 https://www.mediaite.com/?p=5231888" href="https://www.mediaite.com/tv/chuck-todd-says-border-surge-is-a-political-crisis-for-biden/#disqus_thread">
       </a>
      </div>
     </li>
    </ul>
   </section>

    <script>
     window.zergnetLoad = () => {/* globals am */
  console.log('Trying Zergnet', am.detectMobileWidth);
  if (!am.detectMobileWidth) {
    console.log('Loading Zergnet');
    const zergnetRoot = document.querySelector('.o-zergnet');
    const zergnetHerald = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetHeader = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetTag = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetDisclosure = document.createElement('div');
    zergnetHerald.classList.add('o-herald');
    zergnetHerald.classList.add('o-herald-right@desktop');
    zergnetHeader.classList.add('o-zergnet__header');
    zergnetHeader.classList.add('o-section-label');
    zergnetHeader.textContent = 'More Around the Web';
    zergnetDisclosure.classList.add('o-zergnet__disclosure');
    zergnetDisclosure.textContent = 'Ads by Zergnet';
    zergnetTag.id = 'zergnet-widget-45040';
    zergnetTag.classList.add('o-zergnet-unit');
    zergnetHerald.appendChild(zergnetHeader);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetHerald);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetDisclosure);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetTag);
    am.loadScript('https://www.zergnet.com/zerg.js?id=45040');
  }
};
    </script>

     am.log("debug","%czergnet%c %con", "color:pink;","","color:green;");

      More Happening Now

     <li class="o-chron-post o-card u-flex-col-rev">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img o-chron-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.mediaite.com/politics/charlie-crist-tells-cnn-hes-giving-serious-consideration-to-challenging-florida-gov-desantis-for-his-old-job-says-hes-on-the-10-yard-line-probably-going-in-the-end-zone/">
        <img class="o-chron-post__img o-card__img" src="https://am14.mediaite.com/med/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Screen-Shot-2021-03-20-at-7.50.05-PM-432x243.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-chron-post__info o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="o-chron-post__headline">
        <a class="o-chron-post__headline-link" href="https://www.mediaite.com/politics/charlie-crist-tells-cnn-hes-giving-serious-consideration-to-challenging-florida-gov-desantis-for-his-old-job-says-hes-on-the-10-yard-line-probably-going-in-the-end-zone/">
         Charlie Crist Tells CNN He's Giving 'Serious Consideration' to Challenging Florida Gov. DeSantis For His Old Job
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-dateline c-home-chron-post-dateline">
        <span class="o-dateline__author">
         <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
          By
         </span>
         Sarah Rumpf
        </span>
        <span class="o-dateline__date">
         Mar 20th
        </span>
       </div>
       <a class="o-comments-link o-chron-post__comments" data-disqus-identifier="5231843 https://www.mediaite.com/?p=5231843" href="https://www.mediaite.com/politics/charlie-crist-tells-cnn-hes-giving-serious-consideration-to-challenging-florida-gov-desantis-for-his-old-job-says-hes-on-the-10-yard-line-probably-going-in-the-end-zone/#disqus_thread">
       </a>
      </div>
     </li>

   <aside class="o-sidebar c-sidebar-3" id="sidebar-3">
    <div class="promo promo-sidebar o-sidebar-tips c-sidebar-tips" id="tips">
     <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald o-herald-right@desktop c-tips-sidebar__heading" id="tips-heading">

       Tips
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="c-sidebar-tips__body">

      </a>
      <p class="c-sidebar-tips__text">
       <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#3f4b564f4c7f525a5b565e564b5a115c5052">

       </a>

   <section class="o-fcc-full@desktop o-slice c-magazine-post u-lazy-parent" id="magazine-post">
    <div class="o-slice-inner">
     <div class="heading o-section-heading o-herald o-herald-right@desktop c-home-magazine-posts-heading" id="magazine-heading">
      <div class="o-section-label">
       In-Depth
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="o-card-list o-magazine-post o-post-premium">
      <noscript class="u-lazy-child">
       <a class="featured-img c-magazine-post__img-link o-card__img-cell" href="https://www.mediaite.com/premium/tucker-carlson-wins-it-all-in-thursday-ratings-race-taking-most-total-and-demo-viewers/">
        <img class="c-magazine-post__img" src="https://am14.mediaite.com/med/cnt/uploads/2021/03/Tucker-Carlson-Tonight-08_18_08-PM-632x342.jpg"/>
       </a>
      </noscript>
      <div class="o-card__info-cell">
       <h3 class="c-magazine-post__headline">
        <a class="c-magazine-post__headline-link" href="https://www.mediaite.com/premium/tucker-carlson-wins-it-all-in-thursday-ratings-race-taking-most-total-and-demo-viewers/">
         Tucker Carlson Wins It All in Thursday Ratings Race, Taking Most Total and Demo Viewers
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="o-dateline c-magazine-post-dateline">
        <span class="o-dateline__author">
         <span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">
          By
         </span>
         Marisa Sarnoff
        </span>
        <span class="o-dateline__date">
         Mar 19th
        </span>
       </div>
       <a class="o-comments-link c-magazine-post__comments-link" data-disqus-identifier="5231729 https://www.mediaite.com/?p=5231729" href="https://www.mediaite.com/premium/tucker-carlson-wins-it-all-in-thursday-ratings-race-taking-most-total-and-demo-viewers/#disqus_thread">
       </a>
       <div class="excerpt c-magazine-post__excerpt">
        <p>
         Fox’s Tucker Carlson had another good day on Thursday, winning the top spot among total viewers, as well as in the valuable demographic of viewers age 25-54.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
   <div class="o-partner-footer c-partner-footer o-fcc-full@desktop o-slice">
    <div class="o-slice-inner">
     <div id="Mediaite_Desktop_Skin">
      <script data-cfasync="false" src="/cdn-cgi/scripts/5c5dd728/cloudflare-static/email-decode.min.js">
      </script>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       adthrive.cmd.push(function() {googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('Mediaite_Desktop_Skin');});});
      </script>
     </div>
     <script>
      am.log("debug","%cteads-inread%c %coff", "color:pink;","","color:red;");
     </script>
     <!-- NextMillennium -->
     <script>
      window.nextMillenniumLoadFooter = () => am.loadScript('//powerad.ai/script.js')
     </script>
     <!-- End of NextMillennium  -->
     <script>
      am.log("debug","%cnext-millennium%c %con", "color:pink;","","color:green;");
     </script>
     <script>
      window.nativoLoadFooter = () => am.loadScript('//s.ntv.io/serve/load.js')
     </script>
     <script>
      am.log("debug","%cnativo%c %con", "color:pink;","","color:green;");
     </script>
     <script>
      window.bouncexLoad = () => { am.loadScript('//tag.bounceexchange.com/3721/i.js') };
     </script>
     <script>
      am.log("debug","%cbouncex%c %con", "color:pink;","","color:green;");
     </script>
     <script>
      (function(){


  // Setup /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

    // Flip a coin and store results as a global
    var coinFlipResult = (Math.random()<.5);

    // Determine if experiment should run
    var experimentCondition = document.body.classList.contains('is-home');

  // Actions  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

    if (experimentCondition) {

      // Make experimental changes to the DOM based on coin flip results
      makeChanges();

      // Set up an event to be tracked for the experiment
      setupEvent();

    }

  // Functions /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

  function makeChanges() {
    if (coinFlipResult) document.body.classList.add('is-in-group-a');
    else document.body.classList.add('is-in-group-b');
  }

  function setupEvent(){

    // Get the lead post links
    var leadPostHeadlineLink = document.querySelector('.c-lead-post__headline-link');
    var leadPostImgLink = document.querySelector('.c-lead-post__img-link');

    // Add click event listeners
    leadPostHeadlineLink.addEventListener('click', track);
    leadPostImgLink.addEventListener('click', track);

  }

  // Send tracking event with experiment results
  function track() {

    // Fill out fields for this experiment
    var variation = (coinFlipResult)?'A':'B';
    var action = 'Lead story clicked while in group '+variation;
    var trackingFields = [
      '_trackEvent',        // command
      'A/B Tests',          // category
      action,               // action 
      'Control Group Test', // opt_label (optional)
      undefined,            // opt_value (optional)
      true                  // opt_noninteraction ( doesn't affect bounce-rate when true)
    ];

    // Send tracking command
    _gaq.push(trackingFields);
    
  }


})();
     </script>
     <script>
      am.log("debug","%cexperiment-control-group-test%c %con", "color:pink;","","color:green;");
     </script>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>

    <script>
     // <![CDATA[
    var disqus_shortname = 'mediaite';
    (function () {
      var nodes = document.getElementsByTagName('span');
      for (var i = 0, url; i < nodes.length; i++) {
        if (nodes[i].className.indexOf('dsq-postid') != -1) {
          nodes[i].parentNode.setAttribute('data-disqus-identifier', nodes[i].getAttribute('rel'));
          url = nodes[i].parentNode.href.split('#', 1);
          if (url.length == 1) url = url[0];
          else url = url[1]
          nodes[i].parentNode.href = url + '#disqus_thread';
        }
      }
      var s = document.createElement('script'); s.async = true;
      s.type = 'text/javascript';
      s.src = '//' + 'disqus.com/forums/' + disqus_shortname + '/count.js';
      (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
    }());
  //]]>
    </script>
    <!-- End Footer JavaScript -->
    <!-- Twitter universal website tag code -->
    <script>
     !function(e,t,n,s,u,a){e.twq||(s=e.twq=function(){s.exe?s.exe.apply(s,arguments):s.queue.push(arguments);
},s.version='1.1',s.queue=[],u=t.createElement(n),u.async=!0,u.src='//static.ads-twitter.com/uwt.js',
a=t.getElementsByTagName(n)[0],a.parentNode.insertBefore(u,a))}(window,document,'script');
// Insert Twitter Pixel ID and Standard Event data below
twq('init','o4cef');
twq('track','PageView');
    </script>
    <!-- End Twitter universal website tag code -->
    <div id="fb-pxl-ajax-code">
    </div>
    <script id="disqus_count-js-extra" type="text/javascript">
     /* <![CDATA[ */
var countVars = {"disqusShortname":"mediaite"};
/* ]]> */
    </script>
    <script id="disqus_count-js" src="https://am14.mediaite.com/med/cnt/plugins/disqus-comment-system/public/js/comment_count.js?ver=3.0.21" type="text/javascript">
    </script>
    <script async="async" id="remote_sdk-js" src="https://cdn.onesignal.com/sdks/OneSignalSDK.js?ver=5.6.2" type="text/javascript">
    </script>
   </div>
  </footer>
 </body>
</html>
